articles.title: Australia social media ban: Meta blocks 550,000 accounts under new law - BBC
articles.description: The new law, which came into effect in December, is aimed at protecting children from online harm.
articles.content:
About 550,000 accounts were blocked by Meta during the first days of Australia's landmark social media ban for kids.
In December, a new law began requiring that the world's most popular social media… [+2466 chars]

articles.title: One dead and 300 buildings destroyed in Australia bushfires - BBC
articles.description: A state of emergency has been declared in Victoria as thousands of firefighters battle the blaze.
articles.content:
One person has died and 300 properties have been destroyed in bushfires that have torn across south-east Australia. 
The fires have raged in dozens of locations across the country for several days, … [+2835 chars]
